summary: A mercenary is hired to protect an expedition group while they search for a Tangka, a Buddhist artifact worth millions of dollars.
cast: Dolph Lundgren|Nan Yu|Xue Zuren|William Shriver|Raicho Vasilev|NuoMing Huari|Hu Sha|Gregory MacIsaac|Chunnian Zhang|Huriga|Heping Wang|Xinmin Wang|Wang Lusha|Wang Jun|Davy Williams|Gabriel Alejandro Carrillo|Senggerinchin|Gangzhaorige|Siqinggawa|Slavi Slavov|Shawn Zimmerman
director: Directors: Shimon Dotan (as Samuel Dolhasca), Dolph Lundgren (uncredited)
title: Deudas de sangre
